prime.utils.MatrixUtil

type
class
available in
swf
metadata
:build
'???'
:keep
Helper class for working with float-matrices

Static Methods

inline rotateAroundCenter(m : prime.core.geom.Matrix2D, rotation : Float, bounds : prime.core.geom.Rectangle) : Void

inline rotateAroundPoint(m : prime.core.geom.Matrix2D, rotation : Float, anchorX : Float, anchorY : Float, leftPos : Float, topPos : Float) : Void

parameters
m matrix to rotate
rotation rotation in degrees
anchorX x-coordinate to rotate around (relative to the object -> 0 is leftside of the object)
anchorY y-coordinate to rotate around (relative to the object -> 0 is topside of the object)
leftPos x-coordinate of the leftside of the already rotated object (doesn't have to be equal to object.x if it's already rotated)
topPos y-coordinate of the leftside of the already rotated object (doesn't have to be equal to object.y if it's already rotated)
Rotates an IPositionable object around the given anchor

inline scaleAroundCenter(m : prime.core.geom.Matrix2D, scaleX : Float, scaleY : Float, bounds : prime.core.geom.Rectangle) : Void

inline scaleAroundPoint(m : prime.core.geom.Matrix2D, scaleX : Float, scaleY : Float, anchorX : Float, anchorY : Float, leftPos : Float, topPos : Float) : Void
